testCase.name: FlightService should be created
AppEffects should be created
FlightEffect should exist
FlightEffect [Flight] Load Flights should render a LoadFlightsSuccess
FlightEffect [Flight] Save Flight should render a SaveFlightSuccess
Flight Reducer [Flight] Load Flights Success should set the flights
Flight Reducer [Flight] Active location should set the active location
Flight Reducer [Flight] Save Flight Succss flight already exists should update the existing flight on the state
Flight Reducer [Flight] Save Flight Succss New flight should add the flight to the state
Flight Reducer unknown action should return the initial state
InfoComponent should create
InfoComponent should match the snapshot
InfoComponent on close click should open the info dialog
FlightComponent should create
FlightComponent navigate to an existing flight should set the form
FlightComponent navigate to an existing flight should render the component with values
FlightComponent navigate to an NON existing flight should set the form with default values
FlightComponent navigate to an NON existing flight should render the component with values
FlightComponent saveFlight the form is not valid should not dispatch the saveFlight
FlightComponent saveFlight the form is valid the paths are empty should not dispatch the saveFlight
FlightComponent saveFlight the form is valid the paths are empty the paths is set should not dispatch the saveFlight
FlightComponent saveFlight changeLocation should set the location
MapComponent should create
MapComponent should match the snapshot
MapComponent moveNode should call the change the node position
MapComponent deleteNode should call the delete the node
MapComponent addNode should call the add the path to the pathlist
MapComponent centerChanged should change the location
AppComponent should create the app
AppComponent should match the default snapshot
AppComponent it should load the flights
AppComponent on info click should open the info dialog
